description:
Bright, concentric rings for fun; full cushioning throughout the entire sock for long days on your feet. Mesh zones and a seamless toe help prevent overheating and chafing while you're on the trails.

  • Made of soft merino wool, nylon, and elastane
  • Cushioning throughout sock maximizes protection
  • 4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear
  • Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet
name: Smartwool Hike Full Cushion Saturnsphere Crew Socks - Women's
